attributes.additional_details: When I asked for a smartie McFlurry, I was shocked to hear that they had been discontinued and I asked why and the staff at this particular McDonalds as well as staff up and down the country did not know the answer. They too agree with me.
attributes.background: Everyone knows the most popular McFlurry is the smartie one. So why did McDonalds stop producing it? Its a question on a lot of peoples lips: even the people who work there. There are people up and down the country heartbroken at the loss of the smartie McFlurry. So I say bring it back.
